Text: List of painters in the National Gallery of Art:  Of artists listed, there are only 18 women, including Rosalba Carriera, Mary Cassatt, Angelica Kauffmann, Judith Leyster, Georgia O'Keeffe, Elisabeth Louise Vigée-LeBrun, and Marguerite Zorach.
